ygData.subject: Gone too long: A reintroduction
ygData.msgSnippet: Holy Crap! So I m thinking today, ya know, I haven t visited this EQ club I joined waaayyyyyy back, let s pop in and take a look. There s more than 600
ygData.messageBody:
Holy Crap!<br>So I'm thinking today, ya know, I
haven't visited this EQ club I joined waaayyyyyy back,
let's pop in and take a look. There's more than 600
members here! Awesome! Last time I was here I think there
were maybe 50. LOL<br>Anyway, a reintroduction is
probably in order.<br>I play on the Tunare server (left
Mith Marr more than a year ago to play w/ some RL
friends.) My main chars are:<br>Moradin - 32 Dwarven
Paladin<br>Semuanya - 22 Iksar Monk<br>Llolth - 20 Dark Elf Shadow
Knight and proud member of <The
Sisterhood><br>Teidra - 17 Barbarian Warrior and also <The
Sisterhood><br>Gruumsh - 14 Ogre Shaman and proud member of <The
Reverends of Turmoil><br><br>Re-Hiyas to all the old
members, and HELLO! to all the new. I look forward to
getting to know you all in game and on the board
here.<br><br>Timosan
